channel.title: Enzo Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on Enzo Hugo Site

item.title: Taper Fade
item.description: A versatile style where the hair gradually shortens from the top down to neckline, creaating a clean, seamless fade.

item.title: Modern Mullet
item.description: A contemporary take on the '80s classic, featuring short sides, layered top, and a slightly longer back for added flair

item.title: Textured Crop
item.description: Sample article showcasing basic Markdown syntax and formatting for HTML elements.

item.title: Mohawk Fade
item.description: Features a dramatic strip of longer hair in the center with faded sides, perfect for a bold, edgy statement.

item.title: Slicked-Back Undercut
item.description: Combines short sides and back with longer hair on top, slicked back for a polished yet edgy look.

item.title: Buzz Cut with Line-up
item.description: A minimalist short cut complemented by crisp, geometric edges for a clean and striking style

item.title: Classic Side Part
item.description: Guide to emoji usage in Hugo
